definition: to hold/to contain/to accommodate/to tolerate (different opinions)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: A single rookery may contain as many as a million penguins.
sentences.chinese: 一个群栖地可以容纳上百万个企鹅。

sentences.english: It can accomodate 6 people and has all the amenities of a conventional hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 它有齐传统酒店房间的一切设施，并可容纳6人。

sentences.english: The maximum capacity at the Kiss Nightclub in Santa Maria is 1000 people.
sentences.chinese: 圣玛丽亚的亲吻夜总会最多能容纳1000人。

sentences.english: Removable PU foam insole may help accommodate a personal orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸的聚氨酯泡沫鞋垫可以帮助容纳个人的矫正。

sentences.english: This lecture hall is not big enough to hold one thousand listeners.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告厅不够大，不能容纳一千听众。

sentences.english: The CD changer integrated in the glove box compartment holds up to six discs at a time.
sentences.chinese: 手套盒内的CD换碟机能够同时容纳六张光碟。

sentences.english: The container should be deep enough to hold at least 3 centimeters of soil.
sentences.chinese: 播种盘应至少能容纳3厘米深的土壤。

sentences.english: It is a major port of entry served by a deepwater channel that accommodates oceangoing ships. Population, 98,962.
sentences.chinese: 是主要的货物进口港，有可容纳海船的深水道。

sentences.english: This plane can accommodate more than 200 passangers.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机可以容纳超过200名乘客。

sentences.english: However, you design an extension field into the schema to accommodate additional values.
sentences.chinese: 然而，您要在模式中设计一个扩展字段来容纳附加值。

sentences.english: The computer room can hold 70 students.
The system was built in an effort to create a "one-mech" defensive system capable of taking down a starship.
sentences.chinese: 武器系统被改造成了一个能容纳星际飞船的防御系统。

sentences.english: There will be accommodation for 600 personal servants and staff.
sentences.chinese: 这座豪华官邸将可容纳600个家丁和工作人员栖身。

sentences.english: News reports from last year claim the venue holds only 2,700 seats.
sentences.chinese: 从去年要求新闻报导的场地只能容纳2700个座位。

sentences.english: A rated accommodation people for each type of buildings can be achieved using the index.
sentences.chinese: 通过修正系数可获得每类建筑物的额定容纳人数。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
to lay/to place/to put in a certain place
